patthana15.27:4.1: Sappaccayaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naappaccayo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.27:5.1: Sappaccayaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naappaccayo naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.27:6.1: Sappaccayaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā naappaccayo naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
